Riduci a icona FastLane Ingrandisci FastLane Per ridurre FastLane, sfiorare il tasto “Riduci FastLane”. Per ingrandire FastLane, sfiorare il tasto “Ingrandisci FastLane”. Utilità di registrazione operatore Digitare l’ID utente e sfiorare “Invio”, oppure posizionare il dito sul dispositivo biometrico per collegarsi. Connessione non valida. Ricollegarsi utilizzando la tastiera o l’impronta digitale.
Cancella Invio Indietro Spazio Backspace Inserire l'ID usando la tastiera qui sotto. ID o parola d'accesso non corretta. Reinserire utilizzando il tastierino numerico. Inserire la parola d'accesso usando la tastiera qui sotto. Annulla Accesso in corso... Attendere, prego Maiuscole LEGAL CAPTION This system is for the use of authorized personnel only. By logging onto this system, you are subject to the terms and conditions of all Information Security policies and standards. Use by unauthorized individuals or for unauthorized purposes is a violation of federal and/or state law. The company reserves the right to take any necessary actions to protect authorized users, intellectual property and other information assets. Individuals using this system are subject to having all of their activities on this system monitored. Anyone using this system expressly consents to such monitoring and is advised that if such monitoring reveals possible evidence of criminal activity, system personnel may provide the evidence of such monitoring to law enforcement officials.
